content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Editing PTR domains Procedure Go to Inbound Protection → Connection Filtering → Reverse DNS Validation. Click the Blocked PTR Domains tab. From the list of PTR domains, click a PTR domain that you want to edit. You can type the PTR domain name in the search box to find a PTR domain. Modify the PTR domain settings as required. Note For details about the settings, see Adding PTR domains. Click Save. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
